archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 AWE
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Primary University CRM for Access West of England using Disabilities module - manages the study needs assessment, not just UWE. Customised the process and some custom entities to enable the complex process. Portal (future) - student, assessor and QA checker to access docs and data securely in CRM. Integrated with SharePoint for document management (includes access rules).
